title: Stream: Maryann Vasquez – DUE
content:
It’s been a crazy week or so for Maryann Vasquez, having exploded onto the blogs with one of the singles of the year in the form of Turn You Down, she’s now released her debut EP, DUE.

Featuring the previously posted Turn You Down, and Priscilla’ Song, alongside two new cuts, Eyes Closed and Freedom, it’s the sign of an artist with limitless potential. It’s been a long time since I’ve heard a debut EP as self-assured as DUE, particularly the epic-pop vibes of Eyes Closed. Check out the full stream below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
